程序包 org.openjdk.tools.javac.comp

  • 接口概要 
    接口 说明
    Annotate.AnnotationTypeCompleter  
    Check.CheckContext
    A check context is an object that can be used to perform compatibility checks - depending on the check context, meaning of 'compatibility' might vary significantly.
    Modules.PackageNameFinder  
    Resolve.RecoveryLoadClass  
  • 类概要 
    类 说明
    Analyzer
    Helper class for defining custom code analysis, such as finding instance creation expression that can benefit from diamond syntax.
    Annotate
    Enter annotations onto symbols and types (and trees).
    Annotate.AnnotationTypeMetadata
    Represents the semantics of an Annotation Type.
    ArgumentAttr
    This class performs attribution of method/constructor arguments when target-typing is enabled (source >= 8); for each argument that is potentially a poly expression, this class builds a rich representation (see ArgumentType which can then be used for performing fast overload checks without requiring multiple attribution passes over the same code.
    Attr
    This is the main context-dependent analysis phase in GJC.
    AttrContext
    Contains information specific to the attribute and enter passes, to be used in place of the generic field in environments.
    AttrContextEnv
    Env<A> specialized as Env<AttrContext> This is NOT part of any supported API.
    Check
    Type checking helper class for the attribution phase.
    CompileStates
    Partial map to record which compiler phases have been executed for each compilation unit.
    DeferredAttr
    This is an helper class that is used to perform deferred type-analysis.
    Enter
    This class enters symbols for all encountered definitions into the symbol table.
    Env<A>
    A class for environments, instances of which are passed as arguments to tree visitors.
    Flow
    This pass implements dataflow analysis for Java programs though different AST visitor steps.
    Infer
    Helper class for type parameter inference, used by the attribution phase.
    Infer.BoundFilter  
    InferenceContext
    An inference context keeps track of the set of variables that are free in the current context.
    LambdaToMethod
    This pass desugars lambda expressions into static methods This is NOT part of any supported API.
    Lower
    This pass translates away some syntactic sugar: inner classes, class literals, assertions, foreach loops, etc.
    MemberEnter
    Resolves field, method and constructor header, and constructs corresponding Symbols.
    Modules
    TODO: fill in This is NOT part of any supported API.
    Operators
    This class contains the logic for unary and binary operator resolution/lookup.
    Resolve
    Helper class for name resolution, used mostly by the attribution phase.
    Todo
    A queue of all as yet unattributed classes.
    TransTypes
    This pass translates Generic Java to conventional Java.
    TypeEnter
    This is the second phase of Enter, in which classes are completed by resolving their headers and entering their members in the into the class scope.
  • 枚举概要 
    枚举 说明
    CompileStates.CompileState
    Ordered list of compiler phases for each compilation unit.
    DeferredAttr.AttrMode
    The 'mode' in which the deferred type is to be type-checked
  • 异常错误概要 
    异常错误 说明
    Infer.InferenceException
    This exception class is design to store a list of diagnostics corresponding to inference errors that can arise during a method applicability check.
    Resolve.InapplicableMethodException
